com.bill.java.api.models

Class RecurringInvoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bill.java.api.net.ApiResource
      • com.bill.java.api.models.RecurringInvoice

  • public class RecurringInvoice
extends ApiResource
    This is a template to generate Invoice objects that creates individual invoices based on specified criteria.

    Any edits/deletions of recurring invoices only impact future invoices. Already created recurring invoices are not affected. The nested recurringInvoiceLineItems array records more details.
